short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates HOTP Passcodes for Duo Security Multi-Factor Authentication

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Duo Passcode Generator can generate passcodes for Duo Security's multi-factor authentication. It can also autocomplete the passcode field upon generation, allowing instant login after signing in with your normal credentials. Setup and usage instructions can be found at https://github.com/AvikRao/duo-extension/wiki/Setup-and-Usage
